sn47.24:4.2: “Mendicants, there are these four kinds of mindfulness meditation.
sn47.24:4.4: It’s when a mendicant meditates by observing an aspect of the body, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn47.24:4.5: They meditate by observing an aspect of feelings …
sn47.24:4.7: principles, keen, aware, and mindful, rid of desire and aversion for the world.
sn47.24:4.8: These are the four kinds of mindfulness meditation.”
